long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you switch from Flightradar24 to other flight tracking sites:

- Flightaware
- ADSBExchange
- Radarbox

It is very light by means of size, and easy to use. What you only need to do is to click on the aircraft icon on Flightradar24, and browse to the same flight over the TrackIt extension.

Please create an issue here, for the encountered bugs and any features you would like to have : https://github.com/cmbahadir/TrackIt/issues/
